alert.note: Alert for South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Sioux County through 630 PM MDT... At 559 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Agate Bed National Monument, or 29 miles north of Scottsbluff, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Sioux County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
